availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward F. Robinson (Grant County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier (11th KY Cav))

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elijah Robinson and Emily Robinson. Resident of Grant County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Grant County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from September 22, 1862 to February 21, 1863. Died in Monroe County, Kentucky, on February 21, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 312B-313A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 813.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 278-9.
"Robinson, Edward F." Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0111.
